title: @anime experts
body:
are there many cooking anime? its a genre I haven't seen.... usually it is incorporated into larger plots... but i feel like it would make a good stand alone anime...

tbh I could probably write one.... down on his luck guy gets a position as a dish cleaner at a local sushi place, a discerning and revered boss is constantly harassing him until one night the main character creates a dish that the owner mistakenly eats and is infatuated with his cooking, then on he is given tasks to gather rare cooking ingredients, along the way to become the sushi master chef, he encounters waifus such as forest gathering waifus and fisher lady waifus. 

it could totally work.

i'm not much into anime, but I'd watch that.
